alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 19 at 4:03AM EST until February 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility reduced to one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...Middle and Lower Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...A Dense Fog Advisory means that visibilities will frequently be reduced to one quarter mile or less. Hazardous driving conditions will exist in areas due to sudden visibility restriction in dense fog, especially on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
